law.catch_line: Disclosure of records or papers used in selection process.
law.text: The contents of any records or papers used by the Administrative Office of the Courts or the clerk in connection with the selection process and not required to be made public under this chapter shall not be disclosed, except in connection with the preparation or presentation of a motion under the Rules of Civil Procedure or the Rules of Criminal Procedure or upon order of the Chief Justice.
law.history: Amended 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 252, sec. 6, effective July 15, 2002. -- Created 1976 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 22, sec. 22, effective January 2, 1978.
